value.stringValue: We have new offers that may interest you!

actionCalls.name: Send_Email_When_Lead_Is_in_Nurturing
actionCalls.label: Send Email When Lead Is in Nurturing

value.stringValue: Do you need help choosing a place?

Flow.interviewLabel: Flow When Lead is In Nurturing {!$Flow.CurrentDateTime}
Flow.label: Flow When Lead is In Nurturing

textTemplates.name: Body1
textTemplates.text:
Hello {!$Record.FirstName} {!$Record.LastName}

Do you want to learn how to choose the best place to suit your needs?

Maybe you need some advice? Don't worry, I'm here to help you choose!

I can call you soon if you want. Let me know what your schedule looks like!

See our premises

Our company offers a wide range of flats and business premises.


In case of any doubts or questions, please call or write an e-mail.


All the best

{!$User.FirstName} {!$User.LastName}

{!$User.Email}

{!$User.Phone}

textTemplates.name: Body2
textTemplates.text:
Hello {!$Record.FirstName} {!$Record.LastName}

I'm just checking to see if you have time to review my previous email.

I encourage you to do so and to ask questions if you have any doubts or questions.

We have new premises that may interest you. You can see them below.

Get inspired

See our latest apartments and business premises.


If you have any questions, please dont hesitate to get in touch.


All the best

{!$User.FirstName} {!$User.LastName}

{!$User.Email}

{!$User.Phone}
